detectors.description:
Fortunefinance.onlyWhenRunning() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Fortunefinance.sol#76-79) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool)(! isStopped) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Fortunefinance.sol#77)
function totalSupply() public constant returns (uint); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Fortunefinance.sol)#48
function balanceOf(address tokenOwner) public constant returns (uint balance); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Fortunefinance.sol)#49
function allowance(address tokenOwner, address spender) public constant returns (uint remaining); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Fortunefinance.sol)#50
Pragma version^0.4.24 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Fortunefinance.sol#1) allows old versions
solc-0.4.24 is not recommended for deployment
